content: this pattern was written for any big time hockey fan they are good for sitting center ice watching your favorite nhl team they also make great gifts for the hockey fan in your life the pattern includes jerseys and a color code table so all the non-fans who know nothing about hockey can knit the right colors for a friend s team because of the 2 x 1 ribbing they will fit a wide range of people **needles ** 1 24 /60cm or longer us 5/3 75mm circular needle for average women s size 1 24 /60cm or longer us 7/4 5mm circular needle for average men s size *or size to obtain gauge * **gauge for women s size ** 34 stitches x 36 row = 4 /10cm worked in 2x1 rib unstretched on size us 5/3 75mm needles 24 stitches x 36 row = 4 /10cm worked in stockinette stitch on size us 5/3 75mm needles **gauge for men s size ** 28 stitches x 32 row = 4 /10cm worked in 2x1 rib unstretched on size us 7/4 5mm needles 20 stitches x 32 row = 4 /10cm worked in stockinette stitch on size us 7/4 5mm needles **other tools needed ** 3 stitch markers waste yarn or stitch holders tapestry/darning needle m1r & m1l video help http //www knittinghelp com/videos/increases 1 1 http //www knittinghelp com/videos/increases
